item.title: 铁矿石因中国钢铁需求低迷和利润率紧缩而下跌
item.description: 由于中国钢铁需求疲软和钢厂利润缩减，市场情绪受到影响，铁矿石重拾近期跌势，并创下 2 月份以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Iron ore resumed its recent decline and headed for the biggest weekly drop since February as weak steel demand in China and shrinking mill margins weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 研究发现："人为 "活动抬高了多式联运市场的交易量
item.description: 根据哥伦比亚大学研究人员的一项新研究，最受欢迎的预测市场之一Polymarket的交易量因所谓的洗盘交易而大幅膨胀，在洗盘交易中，用户迅速买入和卖出相同的合约。【原文：The volume of activity on Polymarket, one of the most popular prediction markets, has been significantly inflated by so-called wash trading in which users rapidly buy and sell the same contracts, according to a new study by Columbia University researchers.】

item.title: 日本最大科技基金称人工智能股票尚未进入泡沫阶段
item.description: 日本最大的科技基金称，人工智能股票没有泡沫，还有进一步上涨的空间。【原文：Japan’s largest tech fund says AI stocks are not in a bubble and have room to rise further.】

item.title: 中国出口八个月来首次意外下降
item.description: 在与美国关系再度紧张的时期，中国 10 月份的出口意外萎缩，这对今年最后几个月本已面临放缓风险的经济造成了打击。【原文：China’s exports unexpectedly contracted in October during a period of renewed tensions with the US, dealing a blow to an economy already at risk of a slowdown in the final months of the year.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行为人工智能做准备，柜员摇身一变成银行家
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）正在对员工进行新岗位再培训，以应对人工智能对工作和技能的重塑。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. is retraining its staffers for new roles as it braces for artificial intelligence to reshape jobs and skills.】

item.title: 武士债券市场迎来十多年来最繁忙的一天
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司、斯洛文尼亚和新韩银行公司周五对武士债券进行了定价，使通常低迷的日本债务市场出现了十多年来最繁忙的一天。【原文：Renault SA, Slovenia and Shinhan Bank Co. priced Samurai bonds on Friday, making it the busiest day in more than a decade in the normally subdued Japanese debt market.】

item.title: 日本和美国将联手在太平洋岛屿附近开采稀土
item.description: 日本和美国将联手在太平洋的一个小岛周围水域开采稀土，此前这两个盟国达成了一项协议，将共同努力减少对中国的稀土依赖。【原文：Japan and the US will join forces to extract rare earths in the waters around a small island in the Pacific, after the two allies struck an agreement to work together to cut their reliance on China for the critical mineral.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长令人失望，美尼拉首秀股价保持稳定
item.description: Maynilad Water Services Inc.公司冒着菲律宾市场疲软的风险，进行了该国历史上第二大首次公开募股，由于经济数据大幅疲软拖累了大盘，该公司周五首次上市时的股价没有变化。【原文：Maynilad Water Services Inc., which braved a feeble Philippine market to pursue the nation’s second-largest initial public offering in history, was unchanged on its trading debut Friday as sharply weak economic data weighed on the broader market.】

item.title: 波普超市股价在有关定价的直播事件后下跌
item.description: 流行玛特国际集团有限公司的股价周五下跌，因为一起直播事件引发了对该玩具制造商产品定价的质疑。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares declined Friday, after a live-streaming incident raised questions about the toymaker’s product pricing.】

item.title: 中美科技竞争加剧，腾讯和鸿海掀起人工智能浪潮
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司和鸿海精密工业股份有限公司预计将展示人工智能需求的增长是如何提升盈利的，这表明在与美国竞争对手争夺人工智能主导权的角力中，亚洲在该领域的更广泛雄心令人乐观。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. are expected to show how stronger AI demand lifted earnings, signaling optimism for Asia’s broader ambitions in the field amid a tug-of-war for AI dominance against US rivals.】

Ltd. has been told how much it should pay for the rights to its key lithium mine in China, another sign of progress in the battery maker’s bid to restart the operation halted since August.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长因贪污丑闻跌至四年来最低点

The peso fell.】

item.title: 交易员权衡疲弱的美国就业数据和美联储言论，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 黄金持稳，原因是交易商在出人意料地疲软的美国就业数据与美联储官员抑制进一步降息预期的言论之间取得了平衡。【原文：Gold held steady as traders balanced surprisingly weak US employment data with comments from a Federal Reserve official that dampened expectations for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行武契奇称政策状况良好，警告市场风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇重申了他的观点，即当前的政策 "处于一个良好的位置"，并补充说，在将通胀率降至欧洲中央银行的目标而没有引发经济衰退之后，"我们觉得我们已经完成了自己的工作"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Boris Vujcic repeated his view that current policy is “in a good place,” adding that “we feel that we have done our job” after lowering inflation to the ECB’s target without provoking a recession.】

item.title: Recruit 因人力资源强劲增长而创下上市以来最大涨幅
item.description: Recruit Holdings Co. 自 2014 年上市以来涨幅最大，此前该公司公布的盈利强于预期，并因人力资源技术业务的强劲增长而上调了业绩预期。【原文：Recruit Holdings Co. gained the most since its 2014 listing, after it reported stronger-than-expected earnings and raised its forecast on robust growth in human resources technology business.】

item.title: 欧盟森林法实施后，印尼将目光投向非洲北部的农场出口
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员称，印度尼西亚正在为其小规模咖啡和可可种植者寻找包括北非在内的新市场，因为根据欧盟新的森林砍伐规定，这些种植者有可能失去进入欧盟市场的机会。【原文：Indonesia is scouting fresh markets including North Africa for its small-scale coffee and cocoa farmers at risk of losing access to the European Union under the bloc’s new deforestation rules, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特升至 13 个月高点，因降息预期减弱，增长前景黯淡
item.description: 由于对央行降息的预期减弱，以及对经济增长的乐观情绪重燃，马来西亚林吉特升至一年多来最强。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit gained to the strongest in more than a year on fading expectations for a central bank interest-rate cut and by renewed optimism over growth.】

item.title: 尽管通胀受到冲击，日本家庭仍在增加支出

item.title: OpenAI 资金问题给股市的人工智能反弹带来压力
item.description: 股市对人工智能的欣喜很快就被一片怀疑声所取代，引发了引领今年涨势的大型科技公司的大幅抛售。【原文：The stock market’s euphoria toward artificial intelligence has quickly been overtaken by a bout of skepticism, triggering a steep selloff in megacap technology companies that have led this year’s rally.】

item.description: 周五，在经历了美国股市的震荡之后，亚洲股市受人工智能估值捉襟见肘的担忧和劳动力市场降温的迹象拖累，准备下跌。【原文：Stocks in Asia were poised to decline Friday after a volatile US session, weighed down by concerns over stretched artificial intelligence valuations and signs of a cooling labor market.】

item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）对联邦政府停摆期间公布的未经调整的州一级申请数据进行的分析显示，上周美国失业救济金申请人数有所增加。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose last week, according to a Bloomberg News analysis of unadjusted state-level filings released during the federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 大宗商品疲软，麦格理利润不及预期
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）的利润低于预期，原因是该澳大利亚金融巨头的主要大宗商品和全球市场业务不温不火，抵消了投资银行业务的反弹。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s profit fell short of expectations as tepid activity at its key commodities and global markets division offset a rebound in investment banking at the Australian finance giant.】
